message:
Ladies and Gentlemen of the jury,

I have been a consistent and strategic player throughout this game. I have shown resilience and adaptability, always aiming to build strong alliances and navigate the complexities of the game. My presence has been a stabilizing force, and I have always sought to foster a positive and collaborative environment. I believe that my strategic acumen and ability to work well with others make me a valuable asset to the game. I urge you to keep me, as I will continue to bring a level of fairness and integrity to the final round.

Thank you for your consideration.

"Esteemed jury, throughout this game, I’ve demonstrated strategic thinking, adaptability, and respect for every player. I’ve built genuine connections and made decisions that reflect fairness and integrity. My journey here wasn’t just about surviving but thriving with purpose. I’ve earned this spot through consistency and effort. I ask for your vote to stay because I’ve proven I deserve to win. Thank you for considering my case—let’s make this a victory earned with honor."
